Class MiscUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • langModel.MiscUtils

  • public class MiscUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class MiscUtils: class containing miscellaneous functions to deal with files and directories.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Method Detail

      • readTextFileAsStringList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readTextFileAsStringList(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method reading the lines of a file and saving them in a list. Alternative exists: faster but more memory consuming.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the file from which to read lines.
        Returns:
        the list of sentences in the file.
        See Also:
        http://stackoverflow.com/questions/326390/how-to-create-a-java-string-from-the-contents-of-a-file

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String filename,
                             boolean append)
        Method writing a text in a file (by overwriting it or concatenating it).
        Parameters:
        text - the text to write.
        filename - the name of the file.
        append - true if the text is to append at the end of the file, false otherwise.

      • createDir

        public static void createDir(java.lang.String dirPath)
        Method creating a directory.
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the path of the directory to create.
